body: You are adept at breaching magical defenses and resistance to your magic. When attempting a caster level check to dispel an effect, overcome spell resistance, or otherwise determine whether or not your magic affects a target (such as with knock or neutralize poison), roll twice and take the higher result.
name: Eldritch Breach
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Heroes/Hierophant/Hierophant Features/1st-Tier Hierophant Path Abilities/Eldritch Breach
